Articles.Content:
I did manage to locate [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85926-1-0-2-BetterTimeWarp-v2-0!-Customizable-Time-Warp-and-Lossless-Physics-Warp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85926-1-0-2-BetterTimeWarp-v2-0!-Customizable-Time-Warp-and-Lossless-Physics-Warp) , but it still doesn't meet my needs 100% for powered in atmosphere flight warping.

I'm looking for something that will take a sample of my craft in level fight, (take average speed, alt, fuel usage, heading) and then using that sample put me on an on-rail warp so that I can get to the other side of Kerbin in an aircraft without having to wait an hour for the craft to warp there.
It looks like the author of that warp mod isn't going to add any kind of a on rails powered flight function to his mod, so that leaves me still looking for something that can fit my needs.
